title: Democratic Women to host monthly luncheon
title_page: Democratic Women to host monthly luncheon
maintext:
HUNTINGTON — The Democratic Women’s Club of Cabell County (DWCCC) will have a luncheon and monthly meeting on Saturday, Feb. 23, at the Barboursville Moose Lodge, Eastern Heights Shopping Center, 43351 U.S. 60 East in Huntington, at 12:30 p.m.
The program will feature items of public interest and a presentation on pending legislation at the current session of the West Virginia Legislature.
A luncheon buffet will be served at a cost of $15 (checks preferred). Reservations are required, and the deadline is Wednesday, Feb. 20.
All those planning to attend must make advance reservations by email at janetartrip@yahoo.com, kbs25701@gmail.com, or ahughart@usgs.gov. Phone reservations may be made by contacting any of the following: Janet Artrip at 304-634-5855, Barbara Booth at 304-522-1471, Allison Hughart at 304-964-3669, or Kay Stewart at 304-523-4389. New members and guests are always welcome.
